channel.title: A lot of questions, please help me. --New
channel.description: How do you find certain tutorials and guides? 1. How do i add or make items on a private server? 2. If it says on the server; owned by and all that how do i add me on to it as well as, of course if i add stuff? 3. How do i change the name of the server? 4. Is there a way i can upload the server on to a website, so others can download?

item.title: A lot of questions, please help me. --New
item.dc:creator: @DeltaLegitz DeltaLegitz
item.description:
@DeltaLegitz wrote:

OK to answer your questions.

  1. You use Metasequoia to make the Model, then add the Int’s to the Class8.java file and the Models to the models folder. All this server Sided. Refer to SilentCJ’s Big tutorial on modeling or Watch his Video’s on youtube for more information.

  2. Id on’t know what you mean but I guess you can go Client.java and search up the Owners Name and change to yours, Remember, DONT LEECH AND ALWAYS GIVE CREDIT!!

  3. Depending on what source you have, go to GUI.java or client.java and search up what the server name is and change to yours.

  4. Yes you can use UPPIT or MEGAULOAD, though you will need to portforward so they can connect.

I hope I’ve helped, And next time, please use the search button, There’s a reason it’s there.

Read full topic
